scripts.db:migrate:dev: pnpm run db:safe && pnpm exec prisma migrate dev && pnpm run db:generate
scripts.db:push: pnpm run db:safe && pnpm exec prisma db push --skip-generate
scripts.db:reset: pnpm run db:safe && pnpm exec prisma migrate reset --skip-seed --skip-generate --force
scripts.db:full-reset: pnpm run db:reset && pnpm run db:push && pnpm run db:generate && pnpm run db:seed
